plot outline: Sunil Kumar rents a room in the city where he is to play cricket for the home team. He meets with the landlord's daughter, who instantly dislikes him. But after watching him play cricket, she falls in love with him, and both decide to get married. After the marriage both decide to re-locate and do so, living harmoniously for sometime, before differences arise, threatening to break up their "love marriage".
title: Love Marriage
